question.text: How do I set an initial password?

languages.en: How do I set an initial password?
languages.ms: Bagaimana saya menetapkan kata laluan awal?

detailed.en: "Boss, to set your initial password, please log out of Joker first. Then, on the Joker login page, click ‘Forgot Password’ and follow the steps. You’ll receive a TAC for verification, and once verified, you can reset it. 😊 If you face any issues, feel free to contact Telegram support—we’ll assist you immediately! 🙏"
detailed.ms: "Bos, untuk menetapkan kata laluan awal, sila log keluar dari Joker terlebih dahulu. Kemudian, di laman log masuk Joker, klik ‘Lupa Kata Laluan’ dan ikuti langkah-langkah yang diberikan. Anda akan menerima TAC untuk pengesahan, dan selepas disahkan, boleh tetapkan semula. 😊 Jika ada sebarang masalah, sila hubungi sokongan Telegram—kami akan bantu segera! 🙏"
detailed.cn: "老闆，要設定初始密碼，請先從Joker登出。然後在Joker登入頁面，點擊‘忘記密碼’，按照步驟操作。您會收到TAC驗證，驗證通過後即可重設。😊 如有任何問題，請聯繫Telegram客服—我們會立即協助您！🙏"

question.text: Boss, do I need to set a PIN right after registering successfully?
variations: Bos, kena set PIN sebaik sahaja berjaya daftar ke?
Boss, do I need to set a PIN right after registering successfully?
老闆，註冊成功後，需要馬上設定PIN嗎？

languages.en: Is it necessary to set a PIN immediately after registration?
languages.ms: Perlukah saya tetapkan PIN sebaik sahaja pendaftaran berjaya?
languages.cn: 註冊成功後要立刻設定PIN嗎？

detailed.en: "Yes, boss! 😊 For your account’s safety, please set a 6-digit password right after your first successful login!"
detailed.ms: "Ya, bos! 😊 Untuk keselamatan akaun anda, sila tetapkan kata laluan 6 digit selepas log masuk pertama kali!"
detailed.cn: "是的，老闆！😊 為了您帳戶的安全，請在第一次成功登入後立即設定6位數密碼！"

question.text: Can I share my account with friends?

languages.en: Can I share my account with friends?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya berkongsi akaun saya dengan kawan-kawan?
languages.cn: 可以和朋友共用同一个账户吗？

detailed.en: "Sorry, boss, this account is strictly for personal use only. Please don’t share it with friends to avoid any security or financial risks! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Maaf, bos, akaun ini hanya untuk kegunaan peribadi sahaja. Sila jangan berkongsi dengan kawan-kawan untuk elakkan risiko keselamatan atau kewangan! 😊"
detailed.cn: "抱歉，老闆，這帳戶僅限個人使用。請勿與朋友共享，以免出現安全或財務風險！😊"

question.text: Can I lend my account to a friend?

languages.en: Can I lend my account to a friend?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya pinjamkan akaun saya kepada seorang kawan?
languages.cn: 可以将账户借给朋友使用吗？

detailed.en: "Sorry, boss, for the safety of your personal assets, this account is for your use only. Sharing it could lead to losses, and it might result in your account being frozen! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Maaf, bos, demi keselamatan aset peribadi anda, akaun ini hanya untuk kegunaan anda sahaja. Berkongsi boleh menyebabkan kerugian, dan mungkin akaun anda akan dibekukan! 😊"
detailed.cn: "抱歉，老闆，為了您的個人財物安全，帳戶僅限您本人使用。共享可能會導致損失，還可能導致帳戶被凍結！😊"

question.text: Under what circumstances will my account be frozen?

languages.en: Under what circumstances will my account be frozen?
languages.ms: Dalam keadaan apa akaun saya akan dibekukan?
languages.cn: 什么情况下账户会被冻结？

detailed.en: "Boss, if we detect fraud, abnormal betting, or other suspicious activities, the company reserves the right to freeze your account and its balance without prior notice. 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jika kami kesan penipuan, pertaruhan yang tidak normal, atau aktiviti mencurigakan lain, syarikat berhak membekukan akaun anda dan baki tanpa notis terlebih dahulu. 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，若發現詐騙、異常投注或其他可疑行為，公司有權在不提前通知的情況下凍結您的帳戶及其餘額。😊"

question.text: Who is responsible for losses caused by personal mistakes?

languages.en: Who is responsible for losses caused by personal mistakes?
languages.ms: Siapakah yang bertanggungjawab jika berlaku kerugian disebabkan kesilapan peribadi?
languages.cn: 个人操作失误导致的损失由谁负责？

detailed.en: "Boss, the company isn’t responsible for losses due to user errors (like betting mistakes or transfer slip-ups). For more details, you can refer to the user guide in the app! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, syarikat tidak bertanggungjawab atas kerugian akibat kesilapan pengguna (seperti kesalahan pertaruhan atau kesilapan pindahan). Untuk maklumat lanjut, boleh rujuk panduan pengguna dalam aplikasi! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，公司不對因用戶操作失誤（如下注錯誤或轉帳失誤）造成的損失負責。想了解更多，可以參考應用程式裡的用戶指南哦！😊"

question.text: What should I check before making a deposit?

languages.en: What should I check before making a deposit?
languages.ms: Apa yang perlu saya semak sebelum membuat deposit?

detailed.en: "Boss, before making a deposit, please check the payment method first—the crediting time varies depending on your choice. Also, ensure the bank account details from 4D Joker are the latest, as they may change regularly. If you have any concerns, feel free to let us know anytime! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sebelum buat deposit, sila semak cara pembayaran dulu—masa masuk akaun berbeza mengikut pilihan anda. Pastikan juga maklumat akaun bank dari 4D Joker adalah yang terbaru, sebab ia mungkin kerap berubah. Jika ada sebarang kerisauan, sila beritahu kami bila-bila masa! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，充值前請先注意支付方式—到帳時間會因您選擇的方式而不同。同時，請確認4D Joker提供的銀行帳戶信息是最新的，因為這些信息可能會定期更新。如有任何顧慮，隨時告訴我們哦！😊"

question.text: Will the company change its bank account?

languages.en: Will the company change its bank account?
languages.ms: Adakah syarikat akan menukar nombor akaun banknya?
languages.cn: 公司会更换银行账户吗？

detailed.en: "Boss, to ensure the safety of all members, the company will periodically update its bank accounts. Please confirm the latest bank details before each transfer! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, untuk menjaga keselamatan semua ahli, syarikat akan menukar akaun bank secara berkala. Sila pastikan maklumat bank terkini sebelum setiap pindahan! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，為了保障所有會員的安全，公司會不定期更換銀行帳戶。請在每次轉帳前確認最新的銀行信息哦！😊"

question.text: Boss, does the transfer accept IBG (Interbank GIRO)?
variations: Bos, pindahan terima IBG (Interbank GIRO) ke?
Boss, does the transfer accept IBG (Interbank GIRO)?
老闆，轉帳是否接受IBG（Interbank GIRO）？

languages.en: Can I use IBG (Interbank GIRO) for transfers?
languages.ms: Boleh ke guna IBG (Interbank GIRO) untuk pindahan?

detailed.en:
"Boss, we don’t recommend using IBG transfers—it takes 1-3 working days for the bank to process. If it’s not credited after 3 working days, please check with your bank first. 
📌 For further assistance, send the full transaction receipt to live chat, and we’ll help you check! 

Thanks for your patience, boss! 😊🙏"
detailed.ms:
"Bos, kami tidak mengesyorkan penggunaan pindahan IBG—ia memerlukan 1-3 hari bekerja untuk bank memproses. Jika belum masuk selepas 3 hari bekerja, sila semak dengan bank anda terlebih dahulu. 
📌 Untuk bantuan lanjut, hantar resit transaksi lengkap ke live chat, kami akan bantu semak! 

Terima kasih atas kesabaran anda, bos! 😊🙏"
detailed.cn:
"老闆，我們不建議使用IBG轉帳—需要1-3個工作日由銀行處理。如果3個工作日後還沒進帳，請先與您的銀行確認。
📌 如需進一步檢查，請將完整交易收據發到即時訊息，我們會幫您查詢！

謝謝您的耐心，老闆！😊🙏"

question.text: Can I use interbank transfer for deposits?

languages.en: Can I use interbank transfer for deposits?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya menggunakan pemindahan antara bank untuk deposit?
languages.cn: 是否可以使用跨行转账来进行充值？

detailed.en: "Yes, boss! 😊 We recommend using Instant Transfer or DuitNow for deposits, but we advise against using IBG!"
detailed.ms: "Boleh, bos! 😊 Kami mengesyorkan penggunaan Pemindahan Segera atau DuitNow untuk deposit, tetapi kami tidak cadangkan guna IBG!"
detailed.cn: "可以的老闆！😊 我們建議使用即時轉賬或DuitNow進行充值，但不建議使用IBG哦！"

question.text: Boss, what conditions does the top-up receipt need to meet?
variations: Bos, resit topup kena penuhi syarat apa?
Boss, what conditions does the top-up receipt need to meet?
老闆，充值的收據需滿足哪些條件？

languages.en: What requirements must the top-up receipt fulfill?
languages.ms: Apa syarat yang resit topup kena penuhi?
languages.cn: 充值的收據需要滿足什麼條件？

detailed.en: "Boss, please ensure your reference number is entered in the ‘Bank Reference’ field, or the receipt will be invalid. The official bank receipt must be uploaded within 24 hours. Losses due to ATM issues or fake receipts won’t be accepted. 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sila pastikan nombor rujukan anda dimasukkan dalam ruangan ‘Bank Reference’, kalau tidak resit tak sah. Resit rasmi bank perlu dimuat naik dalam masa 24 jam. Kerugian akibat masalah ATM atau resit palsu tidak akan diterima. 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，請確保在‘銀行參考’欄填寫您的編號，否則收據無效。官方銀行收據需在24小時內上傳。因ATM故障或偽造收據造成的損失不會被接受哦！😊"

question.text: What is the minimum deposit amount?

languages.en: What is the minimum deposit amount?
languages.ms: Berapakah jumlah deposit minimum?

detailed.en: "Boss, for a standard deposit, the minimum is RM10. For an Instant Transfer, it’s RM50. 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, untuk deposit standard, minimum ialah RM10. Untuk Pemindahan Segera, ia RM50. 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，普通充值最低是RM10，快速轉賬則是RM50哦！😊"

question.text: Must withdrawals be made to my personal account?

languages.en: Must withdrawals be made to my personal account?
languages.ms: Adakah pengeluaran mesti dibuat ke akaun peribadi saya?
languages.cn: 提款是否必须转到本人账户？

detailed.en: "Yes, boss! 😊 Withdrawals can only be made to a bank account under your own name. Transfers to third-party accounts are not allowed!"
detailed.ms: "Ya, bos! 😊 Pengeluaran hanya boleh dibuat ke akaun bank atas nama anda sendiri. Pindahan ke akaun pihak ketiga tidak dibenarkan!"
detailed.cn: "是的，老闆！😊 提款僅限轉到您本人名下的銀行帳戶，不允許轉到第三方帳戶哦！"

question.text: Boss, if the money I previously topped up into my wallet hasn’t been used for betting, can I withdraw it?
variations: Bos, kalau duit yang saya topup ke dompet sebelum ni tak guna untuk pertaruhan, boleh tarik ke?
Boss, if the money I previously topped up into my wallet hasn’t been used for betting, can I withdraw it?
老闆，如果之前充值到錢包裡的錢還沒有用來投注，能不能提現？

languages.en: Can I withdraw deposited funds if I haven’t placed any bets?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya mengeluarkan dana deposit jika saya belum membuat pertaruhan?
languages.cn: 未投注的充值金额能否提现？

detailed.en: "Sorry, boss, the top-up amount cannot be withdrawn. You need to place bets and win 30% before you can make a withdrawal! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Maaf, bos, jumlah topup tidak boleh ditarik keluar. Anda perlu membuat pertaruhan dan menang 30% sebelum boleh mengeluarkan! 😊"
detailed.cn: "抱歉，老闆，充值金額無法提現。您需要投注並贏得30%後才能提款哦！😊"

question.text: How long does it take for a withdrawal to be processed?

languages.en: How long does it take for a withdrawal to be processed?
languages.ms: Berapa lamakah masa yang diperlukan untuk memproses pengeluaran?

detailed.en: "Boss, withdrawal processing normally takes 5-30 minutes to complete. If it’s not credited after 30 minutes, please inform us immediately! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pemprosesan pengeluaran biasanya mengambil masa 5-30 minit untuk selesai. Jika belum masuk selepas 30 minit, sila maklumkan kepada kami segera! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，提款處理通常需要5-30分鐘完成。如果超過30分鐘還未到帳，請立即通知我們哦！😊"

question.text: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?

languages.en: What is the minimum withdrawal amount?
languages.ms: Berapakah jumlah pengeluaran minimum?

detailed.en: "Boss, the minimum withdrawal amount is RM10! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jumlah pengeluaran minimum ialah RM10! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，最低提款金額是RM10哦！😊"

question.text: How can I confirm if my bet was placed successfully?

languages.en: How can I confirm if my bet was placed successfully?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah saya boleh mengesahkan jika pertaruhan saya berjaya ditempatkan?
languages.cn: 下注后如何确认是否成功？

detailed.en: "Boss, please check your receipt for indicators like ‘SO’ (number sold out) or ‘LM’ (number restricted). If you see these, it means the bet wasn’t successful! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sila semak resit anda untuk tanda seperti ‘SO’ (nombor habis dijual) atau ‘LM’ (nombor dihadkan). Jika ada tanda ini, maksudnya pertaruhan tak berjaya! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，請檢查收據上的標記，如‘SO’（號碼已售完）或‘LM’（號碼被限制售出）。如果有這些標記，表示下注未成功哦！😊"

question.text: How are bets placed after 10:00 PM recorded?

languages.en: How are bets placed after 10:00 PM recorded?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah pertaruhan selepas jam 10 malam direkodkan?

detailed.en: "Boss, bets placed after 10:00 PM will automatically be recorded for the next day! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan yang dibuat selepas jam 10 malam akan direkodkan secara automatik untuk hari berikutnya! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，22:00後的投注會自動計入次日記錄哦！😊"

question.text: How are winnings determined?

languages.en: How are winnings determined?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah kemenangan ditentukan?

detailed.en: "Boss, winnings are determined based on the official system receipt. Any losses due to human errors, such as incorrect betting, are your responsibility! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, kemenangan ditentukan berdasarkan resit rasmi sistem. Sebarang kerugian akibat kesilapan manusia, seperti pertaruhan salah, adalah tanggungjawab anda! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，獎金是根據系統收據來確定的。因人為錯誤（如下注錯誤）導致的損失需由您自行承擔哦！😊"

question.text: How does the company review abnormal betting activities?

languages.en: How does the company review abnormal betting activities?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah syarikat menyemak aktiviti pertaruhan yang tidak normal?
languages.cn: 公司如何审核异常投注？

detailed.en: "Boss, if we detect abnormal transactions like fraudulent behavior, the company reserves the right to void the ticket, even if results are already announced! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jika kami kesan transaksi tidak normal seperti tingkah laku penipuan, syarikat berhak membatalkan tiket tersebut, walaupun keputusan sudah diumumkan! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，若發現異常交易或欺詐行為，公司有權作廢該投注單，即使開獎結果已公布哦！😊"

question.text: What are the cut-off times for lottery betting?

languages.en: What are the cut-off times for lottery betting?
languages.ms: Bilakah masa tamat untuk pertaruhan loteri?
languages.cn: 彩票的投注截止时间是什么？

detailed.en: "Boss, cut-off times depend on the lottery type: (M) MAGNUM: 7:00 PM on Wednesdays, Saturdays, Sundays, and special draw days (usually Tuesdays); (P) PMP: 7:00 PM on the same days; (T) TOTO: 7:00 PM; (S) SINGAPORE POOL: 6:25 PM on Wednesdays, Saturdays, and Sundays; (C) SARAWAK: 6:35 PM; (B) SABAH: 6:35 PM; (D) SANDAKAN: 6:35 PM; (H) GD LOTTO: 7:00 PM daily; (9) 9 LOTTO: 7:25 PM! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, masa tamat bergantung pada jenis loteri: (M) MAGNUM: 7:00 PM pada hari Rabu, Sabtu, Ahad dan hari cabutan khas (biasanya Selasa); (P) PMP: 7:00 PM pada hari yang sama; (T) TOTO: 7:00 PM; (S) SINGAPORE POOL: 6:25 PM pada Rabu, Sabtu, Ahad; (C) SARAWAK: 6:35 PM; (B) SABAH: 6:35 PM; (D) SANDAKAN: 6:35 PM; (H) GD LOTTO: 7:00 PM setiap hari; (9) 9 LOTTO: 7:25 PM! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，彩票投注截止時間依類型而定：(M) MAGNUM：星期三、六、日及特別抽獎日（通常星期二）晚上7:00；(P) PMP：同日晚上7:00；(T) TOTO：晚上7:00；(S) SINGAPORE POOL：星期三、六、日晚上6:25；(C) SARAWAK：晚上6:35；(B) SABAH：晚上6:35；(D) SANDAKAN：晚上6:35；(H) GD LOTTO：每天晚上7:00；(9) 9 LOTTO：晚上7:25哦！😊"

question.text: What do special markings on betting receipts mean?

languages.en: What do special markings on betting receipts mean?
languages.ms: Apa maksud penandaan khas pada resit pertaruhan?
languages.cn: 单据上的特殊标记代表什么？

detailed.en: "Boss, these markings show: SO means ‘number sold out’, LM means ‘number restricted’, CR means ‘insufficient balance’, and GC means ‘betting time has ended’! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, tanda-tanda ni bermaksud: SO ialah ‘nombor habis dijual’, LM ialah ‘nombor dihadkan’, CR ialah ‘baki tidak mencukupi’, dan GC ialah ‘masa pertaruhan sudah tamat’! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，這些標記的意思是：SO是‘號碼已售罄’，LM是‘號碼被限制’，CR是‘餘額不足’，GC是‘投注時間已結束’哦！😊"

question.text: What types of bets are available?

languages.en: What types of bets are available?
languages.ms: Apakah jenis-jenis pertaruhan yang tersedia?

detailed.en: "Boss, the available bet types are: BOX (All Reverse), IBOX (Full Coverage), RV (Reversible), BH (Head Reverse), and BT (Tail Reverse)! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jenis pertaruhan yang ada ialah: BOX (All Reverse), IBOX (Full Coverage), RV (Reversible), BH (Head Reverse), dan BT (Tail Reverse)! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，可用的下注類型有：BOX（全反）、IBOX（全保）、RV（來回）、BH（反頭）和BT（反尾）哦！😊"

question.text: What is IBOX (Full Coverage)?

languages.en: What is IBOX (Full Coverage)?
languages.ms: Apakah IBOX (Full Coverage)?

detailed.en: "Boss, IBOX (Full Coverage) covers all possible permutations, including duplicates. If any permutation matches the official draw, it’s a win. It costs more but boosts your winning chances, though the individual prizes are lower! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, IBOX (Full Coverage) meliputi semua kemungkinan susunan, termasuk yang berulang. Jika mana-mana susunan sepadan dengan cabutan rasmi, ia dianggap menang. Kosnya lebih tinggi tetapi meningkatkan peluang menang, walaupun hadiah individu lebih rendah! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，IBOX（全保）涵蓋所有可能的排列組合，包括重複的。只要任一排列與官方開獎相符就算中獎。成本較高但中獎機會增加，單注獎金會較低哦！😊"

question.text: What is a Big (大) bet?

languages.en: What is a Big (大) bet?
languages.ms: Apakah pertaruhan Big (besar)?

detailed.en: "Boss, a Big bet covers all prize categories—1st, 2nd, 3rd, special, and consolation prizes. It gives you a higher chance of winning but with lower prize amounts per win! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan Big meliputi semua kategori hadiah—pertama, kedua, ketiga, khas, dan hiburan. Ia beri peluang menang lebih tinggi tetapi jumlah hadiah setiap kemenangan lebih rendah! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，Big（大）投注涵蓋所有獎項—頭獎、二獎、三獎、特別獎和安慰獎。中獎機會較高，但單次獎金較低哦！😊"

question.text: What is a Small (小) bet?

languages.en: What is a Small (小) bet?
languages.ms: Apakah pertaruhan Small (kecil)?

detailed.en: "Boss, a Small bet only covers the top three prizes—1st, 2nd, and 3rd—excluding special and consolation prizes. It offers higher prizes per win but a lower overall chance of winning! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan Small hanya meliputi tiga hadiah teratas—pertama, kedua, dan ketiga—tanpa hadiah khas dan hiburan. Hadiah per kemenangan lebih tinggi tetapi peluang menang keseluruhan lebih rendah! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，Small（小）投注僅涵蓋前三等獎—頭獎、二獎、三獎，不包括特別獎和安慰獎。單次獎金較高，但整體中獎機會較低哦！😊"

question.text: What is a 4A bet?

languages.en: What is a 4A bet?
languages.ms: Apakah pertaruhan 4A?

detailed.en: "Boss, a 4A bet is exclusive to 4D games and focuses only on the 1st prize number. It offers the highest prize but has the lowest chance of winning! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan 4A khusus untuk permainan 4D dan hanya bertaruh pada nombor hadiah pertama. Ia menawarkan hadiah tertinggi tetapi peluang menang paling rendah! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，4A投注僅適用於4D遊戲，只針對頭獎號碼。獎金最高，但中獎機會最低哦！😊"

question.text: Provide a comparison of Big, Small, and 4A bets.

languages.en: Provide a comparison of Big, Small, and 4A bets.
languages.ms: Berikan perbandingan antara pertaruhan Big, Small dan 4A.

detailed.en: "Boss, Big bets give you a high chance of winning with lower prize amounts; Small bets offer medium winning chances with higher prizes; 4A bets have the lowest winning probability but provide the highest prize! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, pertaruhan Big beri peluang menang tinggi dengan hadiah lebih rendah; pertaruhan Small tawarkan peluang menang sederhana dengan hadiah lebih tinggi; pertaruhan 4A ada peluang menang paling rendah tapi hadiah tertinggi! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，Big投注中獎概率高但獎金低；Small投注中獎概率中等，獎金較高；4A投注中獎概率最低，但獎金最高哦！😊"

question.text: How do I choose between Big, Small, and 4A bets?

languages.en: How do I choose between Big, Small, and 4A bets?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah saya memilih antara pertaruhan Big, Small dan 4A?

detailed.en: "Boss, if you want higher winning chances with lower prizes, go for Big. If you’re aiming for higher prizes and can take more risk, pick Small. For betting only on the 1st prize with the highest payout, choose 4A! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, jika anda mahu peluang menang lebih tinggi dengan hadiah rendah, pilih Big. Jika anda sasarkan hadiah lebih besar dan boleh ambil risiko, ambil Small. Untuk pertaruhan hanya pada hadiah pertama dengan bayaran tertinggi, pilih 4A! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，若想中獎機會高但獎金低，選Big；若追求高獎金並願意冒險，選Small；若只針對頭獎且要最高獎金，選4A哦！😊"

question.text: What is BOX (All Reverse)?

languages.en: What is BOX (All Reverse)?
languages.ms: Apakah BOX (All Reverse)?

detailed.en: "Boss, BOX (All Reverse) generates only reverse or partial arrangements, making it a more affordable betting option! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, BOX (All Reverse) hanya menghasilkan susunan terbalik atau sebahagian, jadi ia pilihan pertaruhan yang lebih murah! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，BOX（全反）僅生成反向或部分排列，是一種更經濟的投注方式哦！😊"

question.text: Which lotteries qualify for MAGIC BOX?

languages.en: Which lotteries qualify for MAGIC BOX?
languages.ms: Loteri mana yang layak untuk MAGIC BOX?
languages.cn: 哪些彩票有资格参与MAGIC BOX活动？

detailed.en: "Boss, only lotteries marked with (M), (P), (T), (S), (C), (B), (D), (H), and (9) qualify for MAGIC BOX! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, hanya loteri yang ditandakan dengan (M), (P), (T), (S), (C), (B), (D), (H), dan (9) layak untuk MAGIC BOX! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，只有標有(M)、(P)、(T)、(S)、(C)、(B)、(D)、(H)和(9)的彩票才有資格參與MAGIC BOX哦！😊"

question.text: How can I receive MAGIC LETTER rewards?

languages.en: How can I receive MAGIC LETTER rewards?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah saya boleh menerima ganjaran MAGIC LETTER?

detailed.en: "Boss, the system will automatically grant MAGIC LETTER rewards to qualifying bets that exceed 1 unit per ticket! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sistem akan secara automatik memberikan ganjaran MAGIC LETTER kepada pertaruhan yang layak melebihi 1 unit setiap tiket! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，系統會自動向單注投注超過1元的合格投注發放MAGIC LETTER獎勵哦！😊"

question.text: How can I check MAGIC BOX odds and rules?

languages.en: How can I check MAGIC BOX odds and rules?
languages.ms: Bagaimanakah saya boleh menyemak peraturan dan peluang MAGIC BOX?
languages.cn: 如何查询MAGIC BOX的赔率与玩法？

detailed.en: "Boss, please contact our customer support for detailed information on MAGIC BOX odds and rules! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, sila hubungi sokongan pelanggan kami untuk maklumat terperinci mengenai peluang dan peraturan MAGIC BOX! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，請聯繫客服以獲取MAGIC BOX賠率與玩法的詳細信息哦！😊"

question.text: Can I cancel a bet after placing it?

languages.en: Can I cancel a bet after placing it?
languages.ms: Bolehkah saya membatalkan pertaruhan selepas menempatkannya?

detailed.en: "Boss, yes, you can cancel a bet within 30 minutes of placing it! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, boleh, anda boleh membatalkan pertaruhan dalam masa 30 minit selepas ditempatkan! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，可以的，下注後30分鐘內可申請取消哦！😊"

question.text: Boss, how do I change my password?
variations: Bos, macam mana nak tukar kata laluan?
Boss, how do I change my password?

languages.en: How can I change my password?
languages.ms: Macam mana saya boleh tukar kata laluan saya?

detailed.en: "Boss, to change your password, please tap the bottom right corner to open your profile, select ‘Update Password,’ enter your current password, and then set a new one! 😊"
detailed.ms: "Bos, untuk menukar kata laluan, sila tekan sudut kanan bawah untuk buka profil anda, pilih ‘Kemas Kini Kata Laluan,’ masukkan kata laluan semasa, dan tetapkan yang baru! 😊"
detailed.cn: "老闆，要更改密碼，請點擊右下角打開您的個人信息，選擇‘更新密碼’，輸入當前密碼後即可設定新密碼哦！😊"
